amendment.description: Amendment provides that an amendment to H.R. 3820 by Rep. Thomas of California printed in the Congressional Record of July 24, 1996 shall be considered as adopted in the House and in the Committee of the Whole.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that the amendment numbered 1 as printed in the Congressional Record of July 24, 1996 and submitted by Mr. Thomas of California, be considered as adopted in the House and in the Committee of the Whole, should the House adopt H. Res. 481.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Solomon amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
